tool_description: Fast, simple and reliable API to retrieve car data. Contains data on almost all car manufacturers and models, updated regularly.
name: Car Specs
title: Car Specs

api_list.name: Download Entire Database
api_list.description: Returns a zipped csv file containing all the data that the Car Specs API owns.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://car-specs.p.rapidapi.com/v2/cars/download-database"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "car-specs.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get Car Specs
api_list.description: Returns detailed specs for the chosen car by trim id.

api_list.name: Get Trims By Generation ID
api_list.description: Returns a list of all engines (trims) available for a given generation of a car model.

api_list.name: Get Generations By Model ID
api_list.description: Returns a list of generations of a car model.

api_list.name: Get Makes
api_list.description: Returns a list of all car manufacturers available in the API.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://car-specs.p.rapidapi.com/v2/cars/makes"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "car-specs.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

import requests

api_list.name: Get Models By Make ID
api_list.description: Returns a list of all models for a given car make.
